metadata.title: CVE-2021-41990 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The gmp plugin in strongSwan before 5.9.4 has a remote integer overflow via a crafted certificate with an RSASSA-PSS signature. For example, this can be triggered by an unrelated self-signed CA certificate sent by an initiator. Remote code execution cannot occur.

criterions.comment: strongswan package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.9.1-1ubuntu1.2').
